title: Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Ruched Maxi Long Sleeve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and flattering
items.body: I ordered this last minute for a military ball and was nervous because I have a very large bust (38 in) in comparison to my band(32) and waist(26) but it fit great and allowed me to wear my bra under. The a-line silhouette was flattering and the fabric was comfortable. I like it so much I bought another in red. Read more
items.author: maddie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty color and design
items.body: Pretty fabric and style but tight in bodice area Read more
items.author: bevvygale

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: It’s a gorgeous dress. Worth every penny and more. Like other reviewers stated, the bodice is tight though. I suggest if you’re in between sizes you might want to size up unless you’re fine with the tight waist. For me it works and it’s the most gorgeous dress. Read more
items.author: Scarlett Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and classy
items.body: This dress is gorgeous and comfortable which is a major win all around. In black, I felt like a gothic dream. I was giving Morticia Addams and going to the opera. I usually wear an xsmall or small, but decided to go with a small in this dress because of the fitted nature of the top and I am pretty busty. I am glad I went with the small, because it was quite tight across the chest for me making the rouching pull a bit and I needed to mess with it to get that pleated look just right. I probably would have preferred the xsmall though for the sleeves/shoulders, waist and length, but the small will be fine. The dress made of a soft mesh overlay that is fully line with a soft solid fabric except in the sleeves which are just a single layer of mesh. The neckline is probably my favorite as it come up high in the back and cuts lower and wide with a square shape in the front which allows you to wear a normal bra, but it still looks really sexy and fancy. The dress is very fitted through the bust and upper waist, but then flares out and just skims over the body at the lower waist and hips which I think is a very flattering cut on pretty most body types. The dress has a really good "swoosh" factor to it. It is actually a pretty good length on someone who is short as well. I am just under 5ft and the small hit just at the tops of my feet without touching the ground. Read more
items.author: Steph

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice style
items.body: I picked this item from Vine to review for Annie as I thought that it would look nice on her. I am smart however and asked her first if she liked it. LOL. I was right, it does look nice on her. I asked her to give me her thoughts from a woman's point of view. This dress was a gift and couldn't be more perfect! I like that the lining is part of the dress. The fit is super flattering. The open neckline and rushed chest area are attractive and it fits in such a way that it could possibly be worn without a bra. I am 5'7" and the size XL comes just to the top of my shoes. I love this so much that I may buy it again in red! Read more
items.author: James W.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Elegant, and Flattering
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. The wine color is rich and classy, and the fit is incredibly flattering. The square neckline and ruching give it a polished look while still feeling comfortable to wear. The material feels soft, lightweight, and flows beautifully when walking. Perfect for weddings, parties, or any formal event. Definitely worth the price. Read more
items.author: Ruman Reazulislam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable to wear and easy to move in
items.body: This Maxi Dress is a stunning choice for weddings, cocktail parties, or formal events. The flowy A line silhouette and mesh fabric create a soft, elegant movement, while the square neckline and ruched detailing add a flattering, feminine touch. The long sleeves make it perfect for cooler weather, and the maxi length gives it a graceful, sophisticated look. The dress is comfortable to wear and easy to move in, making it ideal for dancing or mingling at events. Read more
items.author: Mudassar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous color. Flattering
items.body: The dress runs true to size, however is fitted- so if you are between sizes I would size up- since there is stretch. I am 6’0 , 195 lbs and ordered a large. The dress is lined, so you won’t need to wear something under it. Material is comfortable to wear. The sleeves are actually long enough for my 6’0 self- so massive plus. And the dress comes a few inches above my ankle. The bust is flattering- and you can maneuver the fabric a little. Because of the cut, you can wear a regular bra which is nice. The color is vibrant- looks very pretty on. A dress you could wear for various occasions. Read more
items.author: DB

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Ruched Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Ruched Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
